fields.personality: Cheerful and optimistic, always looking for the best in people and situations.
fields.ideal: I believe that everyone deserves a chance to prove themselves, no matter their past.
fields.bond: I am searching for my long-lost sibling, who disappeared when we were children.
fields.flaw: I am easily distracted by shiny objects and beautiful things.
fields.backstory: Once a member of a noble family, I was exiled from my home after a scandalous affair with a servant. Now I wander the land, searching for my lost sibling and trying to make a name for myself as a hero.
fields.physical: Toned and athletic, with a few scars from past battles.
